content.rendered:
INFORMATION FOR SPONSORS AND ADVERTISEMENTS

The symposium registration fee will is kept low to allow as many people as possible to participate. Special efforts will be made during the symposium to foster technology cooperation amongst developing countries especially in the Southeast Asian region. Funds are needed to cover symposium expenses, provide much needed travel grants and support waiver of registration fee for deserving applicants.

PLATINUM SPONSOR

Minimum Contribution USD 4000 (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)
Benefits

  • Maximum number of Platinum Sponsors is restricted to 2
  • 5 Free Registration for Onsite Event for sponsor organization.
  • 5 Free Registration for Online Event for sponsor organization.
  • 2 Presentation slots of 30 minutes duration at Biz-Meet Session
  • Display of the logo of sponsor organization on Conference Website
  • Display of the logo of sponsor organization banner and other promotion materials.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 50% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

GOLD SPONSOR

Minimum contribution USD 3000 (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)

Benefits:

  • Maximum number of Gold Sponsors is restricted to 3
  • 3 Free Registration for Onsite Event for sponsor organization.
  • 3 Free Registration for Online Event for sponsor organization.
  • 2 Presentation slots of 20 minutes duration at Biz-Meet Session
  • Display of the logo of sponsor organization on the Conference Website.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 30% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

SILVER SPONSOR

Minimum contribution USD 2000 (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)

Benefits :

  • Maximum number of Silver Sponsors is restricted to 5
  • 2 Free Registration for Onsite Event for sponsor organization.
  • 2 Free Registration for Online Event for sponsor organization.
  • 2 Presentation slots of 10 minutes duration at Biz-Meet Session
  • Listing of Sponsor URL as related links in the Conference Website.
  • 10% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

FEE FOR ADVERTISEMENTS IN THE PROCEEDINGS

Advertisements are invited for inclusion in the GIS-IDEAS 2021 Conference Proceedings (pdf version). Advertisement rates are as below;

  • Full Page color 400 USD (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)
  • Half Page color 200 USD (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)
  • Full inside back cover (color) 800 USD (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)

FEE FOR ADVERTISEMENTS ON THE WEBSITE.

  • 200 USD (or equivalent in Vietnamese Dong)

The advertisements will be placed on the side panel or the at the foot of the webpage depending on the number of advertisements received.

For more details or to become a sponsor, exhibitor or advertiser contact secretariat-2023@gis-ideas.org
